category-def.name: org.eclipse.ice
category-def.label: ICE
category-def.description: This category contains the plugins that define the core ICE Infrastructure.

category-def.name: org.eclipse.ice.materials

category-def.name: org.eclipse.eavp
category-def.label: Eclipse Advanced Visualization Project
